Translation: Held against him the beautiful Venus
So fond of the Lusitanian people,
For the many qualities he saw in her

Original: Da antiga tão amada sua Romana;
Translation: that reminded her of his dear old Rome;

Original: Nos fortes corações, na grande estrela,
Translation: In their stout hearts, in the great star
that they displayed in the land of Tangiers,

Original: E na língua, na qual quando imagina,
IPA ( Lisbon ): i nə ˈɫĩɡwə nə ˈkwaɫ ˈkwɐ̃dwiməˈʒinə
IPA ( Rio de Janeiro ): i nɐ̞ ˈɫĩɡwə nɐ̞ ˈkwaw ˈkwɜ̃dwĩməˈʑĩnə
IPA ( São Paulo ): ɪ nɐ̞ ˈɫĩɡwə nɐ̞ ˈkwaʊ̯ kwə̃dwĩmɐˈʑinə
IPA ( Santiago de Compostela ): e na ˈliŋɡwa na ˈkal ˈkando jmaˈʃina
Translation: And the language, which if you think of it
